data.name: Dungeon Defenders II - Champion Pack
data.detailed_description:
Become a true Champion of Etheria and supporter of Dungeon Defenders II with this pack. Gain the largest offered discount on gems and use them for additional heroes, costumes, inventory space, and more!

This pack may only be purchased once per account. To redeem the items contained in the pack, visit and interact with the Mailbox in the Heroes Marketplace or Private Tavern.

This pack contains:

13,000 Gems[/b] to purchase Heroes, Flair, Costumes and more. (3,000 Extra Gems!)

10 Mythical Defender Packs[/b] to gain any number of cosmetic rewards to look your best!

3 of Each Campaign through Chaos VI Shard Packs[/b] to equip unique bonuses to your heroes and defenses.

“The Royal” Title[/b] to show Etheria your prowess.

Legendary Katkarot Pet[/b] to achieve ultimate levels of power!

data.short_description: Become a true Champion of Etheria and supporter of Dungeon Defenders II with this pack. Gain the largest offered discount on gems and use them for additional heroes, costumes, inventory space, and more!This pack may only be purchased once per account.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1) 64-Bit
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 2600 or better / NVIDIA GeForce 8600 or better, 512 MB video memory, with Shader Model 3 support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1) / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Quad-Core or better
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 or AMD Radeon HD 4770 or better (1GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play. Integrated graphics chips are not recommended.
